name: AreaChart
classdesc:
JET Area Chart

An area chart displays information graphically using lines and filled areas, making relationships among the data easier to understand.


<oj-c-area-chart
  data="[[dataProvider]]">
</oj-c-area-chart>

Accessibility

To make your component accessible, the application is required to include contextual information for screender readers using one or more the following methods as appropriate:
  • aria-describedby
  • aria-labelledby
  • aria-label
  • short-desc property of your items

If your application has custom keyboard and touch shortcuts implemented for the component, these shortcuts can conflict with those of the component. It is the application's responsibility to disclose these custom shortcuts, possibly via a datatip or help popup.

When setting color, applications are responsible for making sure that the color meets the minimum contrast requirements.

Keyboard End User Information

Key Action
Tab Move focus to next element.
Shift + Tab Move focus to previous element.
UpArrow Move focus and selection to previous data item.
DownArrow Move focus and selection to next data item.
LeftArrow Move focus and selection to previous data item.
RightArrow Move focus and selection to next data item.
Shift + UpArrow Move focus and multi-select previous data item.
Shift + DownArrow Move focus and multi-select next data item.
Shift + LeftArrow Move focus and multi-select previous data item.
Shift + RightArrow Move focus and multi-select next data item.
Ctrl + UpArrow Move focus to previous data item, without changing the current selection.
Ctrl + DownArrow Move focus to next data item, without changing the current selection.
Ctrl + LeftArrow Move focus to previous data item, without changing the current selection.
Ctrl + RightArrow Move focus to next data item, without changing the current selection.
Ctrl + Spacebar Multi-select data item with focus.
= or + Zoom in one level if zooming is enabled.
- or _ Zoom out one level if zooming is enabled.
PageUp or Shift + PageUp Pan left in left-to-right locales. Pan right in right-to-left locales.
PageDown or Shift + PageDown Pan right in left-to-right locales. Pan left in right-to-left locales.
Enter Drill on data item, categorical axis label, or legend item when drilling is enabled.
Shift+F10 Launch the context menu if there is one associated with the current item.

Performance

Data Set Size

As a rule of thumb, it's recommended that applications only set usable data densities on the chart. For example, it's not recommended to show more than 500 area series on a 500 pixel wide chart, since the areas will be unusably thin. While there are several optimizations within the chart to deal with large data sets, it's always more efficient to reduce the data set size as early as possible. Future optimizations will focus on improving end user experience as well as developer productivity for common use cases.

Styling

Use the highest level property available. For example, consider setting styling properties on styleDefaults or series, instead of styling properties on the individual data items. The chart can take advantage of these higher level properties to apply the style properties on containers, saving expensive DOM calls.

Touch End User Information

Target Gesture Action
Data Item Tap Select when selectionMode is enabled.
Drill when drilling is enabled and selectionMode is none.
Double Tap Drill when drilling is enabled and selectionMode is enabled.
Press & Hold Display tooltip.
Display context menu on release.
Categorical Axis Item Tap Drill when drilling is enabled.
Press & Hold Display context menu on release.
Legend Item Tap Drill when drilling is enabled.
Filter when hideAndShowBehavior is enabled.
Plot Area Drag Pan when panning is enabled and toggled into that mode.
Marquee select when selectionMode is multiple and toggled into that mode.
Pinch-close Zoom out when zooming is enabled.
Spread-open Zoom in when zooming is enabled.
Press & Hold Display context menu on release.
Series Area Press & Hold Display context menu on release.
Axis Title Press & Hold Display context menu on release.

tstype.value: interface CAreaChartElement<K extends string | number,D extends oj-c.AreaChart.AreaItem<K> | any> extends JetElement<AreaChartElementSettableProperties<K,D>>

ojsignature.value: interface CAreaChartElement<K extends string | number,D extends oj-c.AreaChart.AreaItem<K> | any> extends JetElement<AreaChartElementSettableProperties<K,D>>

name: data
description:
Specifies the DataProvider for the sections and items of the area-chart.
A progressive loading indicator is shown by the component when the data provider fetch takes longer than a certain time.

name: seriesComparator
description: A comparator function that determines the ordering of the chart series when using a DataProvider. If undefined, the series will follow the order in which they are found in the data. The series objects will have the same properties as the context for seriesTemplate's $current. If seriesComparator(a, b) is less than 0, chart series a comes before chart series b. If seriesComparator(a, b) is 0, the original order is preserved. If seriesComparator(a, b) is greater than 0, chart series b comes before chart series a.

name: groupComparator
description: A comparator function that determines the ordering of the chart groups when using a DataProvider. If undefined, the group will follow the order in which they are found in the data. The group objects will have the same properties as the context for groupTemplate's $current. If groupComparator(a, b) is less than 0, chart group a comes before chart group b. If groupComparator(a, b) is 0, the original order is preserved. If groupComparator(a, b) is greater than 0, chart group b comes before chart group a.

name: stack
description: Defines whether the data items are stacked.

ojvalues.name: on
ojvalues.description: Data items belonging to same group will be stacked.

ojvalues.name: off
ojvalues.description: Data items will not be stacked.

name: drilling
description: Whether drilling is enabled. Drillable objects will show a pointer cursor on hover and fire an ojItemDrill, ojSeriesDrill and ojGroupDrill event on click (double click if selection is enabled). Use "on" to enable drilling for all series objects (legend items), group objects (x-axis labels), and data items. To enable or disable drilling on individual series, group, or data item, use the drilling attribute in each series, group, or data item.

ojvalues.name: on
ojvalues.description: Drilling is enabled on data items, axis labels and legend items.

name: orientation
description: The orientation of the chart.

name: timeAxisType
description: The type of time axis to display in the chart. If the value is "enabled" or "skipGaps", the time values must be provided through the "group-id" attribute of the oj-c-area-chart-item element. In this case, stacking is supported. If the value is "skipGaps", the groups will be rendered at a regular interval regardless of any time gaps that may exist in the data. If the value is "mixedFrequency", the time values must be provided through the "x" attribute of the oj-c-area-chart-item element. In this case stacking is not supported. The time values provided must be an ISO date string.

ojvalues.name: enabled
ojvalues.description: The regular time axis type. Time values are passed using oj-c-area-chart-item group-id attribute.

ojvalues.name: mixedFrequency
ojvalues.description: The mixed frequency time axis type. The mixed frequency time axis type is used when different series have different sampling frequencies. Time values are passed using oj-c-area-chart-item x attribute.

ojvalues.name: skipGaps
ojvalues.description: The regular time axis type. Time values are passed using oj-c-area-chart-item group-id attribute. Gap between time values will be ignored.

name: yAxis
description: An object defining properties for the y axis, tick marks, tick labels, and axis titles.

name: y2Axis
description: The y2Axis options for the chart.

name: splitDualY
description: Defines whether the plot area is split into two sections, so that sets of data assigned to the different Y-axes appear in different parts of the plot area.

ojvalues.name: on
ojvalues.description: Plot Area is split into two sections, one for each Y-axis.

name: splitterPosition
description: In a split dual-Y chart, specifies the fraction of the space that is given to the Y-axis subchart. Valid values are numbers from 0 to 1.

name: xAxis
description: An object defining properties for the x axis, tick marks, tick labels, and axis titles.

name: plotArea
description: An object defining the style of the plot area.

name: zoomAndScroll
description:
Specifies the zoom and scroll behavior of the chart. "Live" behavior means that the chart will be updated continuously as it is being manipulated.
While "live" zoom and scroll provides the best end user experience, no guarantess are made about the rendering performance or usability for large data sets or slow client environments.

name: valueFormats
description: An object specifying value formatting and tooltip behavior, whose keys generally correspond to the attribute names on the data items.

name: styleDefaults
description:
Object type defining the default styles for series colors, marker shapes, and other style attributes.
Properties specified on this object may be overridden by specifications on the data object.

name: selectionMode
description: The type of selection behavior that is enabled on the area chart This attribute controls the number of selections that can be made via selection gestures at any given time.

name: selection
description: An array containing the ids of the initially selected data items.

name: hiddenCategories
description: An array of category strings used for filtering. Series or data items with any category matching an item in this array will be filtered.

name: dragMode
description:
The action that is performed when a drag occurs on the chart. Pan and marquee zoom are only available if zoom and scroll is turned on.
Marquee select is only available if multiple selection is turned on. If the value is set to "user" and multiple actions are available,
buttons will be displayed on the plot area to let users switch between modes. Only 'select' and 'pan' buttons are shown in mobile, as
zoom in or out can be performed with 2 finger pinch gesture.

name: highlightedCategories
description: An array of category strings used for highlighting. Series or data items matching categories in this array will be highlighted.

name: hideAndShowBehavior
description: Defines the hide and show behavior that is performed when clicking on a legend item. When data items are hidden, the y axes can be optionally rescaled to fit to the remaining data.

ojvalues.name: withRescale
ojvalues.description: Rescaling of y axis when items are hidden.

ojvalues.name: withoutRescale
ojvalues.description: No rescaling of y axis when items are hidden.

name: hoverBehavior
description: Defines the behavior applied when hovering over data items.

name: highlightMatch
description:
The matching condition for the highlightedCategories property.
By default, highlightMatch is 'all' and only items whose categories match all of the values specified in the highlightedCategories array will be highlighted.
If highlightMatch is 'any', then items that match at least one of the highlightedCategories values will be highlighted.

ojvalues.name: any
ojvalues.description: Any matching categories will be highlighted.

ojvalues.name: all
ojvalues.description: Items only with all matching categories will be highlighted.

name: legend
description: An object defining the style, positioning, and behavior of the legend.

name: contextMenuConfig
setProperty
description: Sets a property or a single subproperty for complex properties and notifies the component of the change, triggering a corresponding event.

params.name: property
params.description: The property name to set. Supports dot notation for subproperty access.

params.name: value
params.description: The new value to set the property to.

name: getProperty
description: Retrieves the value of a property or a subproperty.

params.name: property
params.description: The property name to get. Supports dot notation for subproperty access.

name: setProperties
description: Performs a batch set of properties.

params.name: properties
params.description: An object containing the property and value pairs to set.

name: ojViewportChange
description: Triggered after the viewport is changed due to a zoom or scroll operation.

properties.name: startGroup
properties.description: The start group of the new viewport on a chart with categorical axis.

properties.name: endGroup
properties.description: The end group of the new viewport on a chart with categorical axis.

properties.name: xMax
properties.description: The maximum x value of the new viewport.

properties.name: xMin
properties.description: The minimum x value of the new viewport.

properties.name: yMax
properties.description: The maximum y value of the new viewport.

properties.name: yMin
properties.description: The minimum y value of the new viewport.

name: ojItemDrill
description: Triggered on a chart item (double click if selection is enabled, single click otherwise).

properties.name: id
properties.description: The id of the drilled object.

properties.name: series
properties.description: The series id of the drilled object.

properties.name: group
properties.description: The group id of the drilled object.

properties.name: data
properties.description: The data object of the drilled item.

properties.name: itemData
properties.description: The row data object of the drilled item. This will only be set if a DataProvider is being used.

properties.name: seriesData
properties.description: The data for the series of the drilled object.

properties.name: groupData
properties.description: An array of data for the group the drilled object belongs to.

name: ojGroupDrill
description: Triggered on a chart group drill gesture (double click if selection is enabled, single click otherwise).

properties.name: id
properties.description: The id of the drilled object.

properties.name: group
properties.description: The group id of the drilled object.

properties.name: groupData
properties.description: An array of data for the group the drilled object belongs to.

properties.name: items
properties.description: An array containing objects describing the data items belonging to the drilled group.

name: ojSeriesDrill
description: Triggered on a chart series drill gesture (double click if selection is enabled, single click otherwise).

properties.name: id
properties.description: The id of the drilled object.

properties.name: series
properties.description: The series id of the drilled object.

properties.name: seriesData
properties.description: The data for the series of the drilled object.

properties.name: items
properties.description: An array containing objects describing the data items belonging to the drilled group.

name: ojContextMenuAction
description: Triggered when a menu item is clicked, whether by keyboard, mouse, or touch events.

tstype.value: { type: 'background'; }|{ type: 'xAxisTickLabel'; data: oj-c.AreaChart.Group; }|{ type: 'axisTitle'; axis: 'x' | 'y'; }|{ data?: oj-c.AreaChart.AreaItem<K>; itemData?: D; type: 'item'; }|{ type: 'series'; data: oj-c.AreaChart.AreaChartSeries<K>; }

name: ojContextMenuSelection
description: Triggered when a select menu item is clicked, whether by keyboard, mouse, or touch events.

tstype.value: { type: 'background'; }|{ type: 'xAxisTickLabel'; data: oj-c.AreaChart.Group; }|{ type: 'axisTitle'; axis: 'x' | 'y'; }|{ data?: oj-c.AreaChart.AreaItem<K>; itemData?: D; type: 'item'; }|{ type: 'series'; data: oj-c.AreaChart.AreaChartSeries<K>; }

name: itemTemplate
description:
The itemTemplate slot is used to specify the template for creating each item of the chart. The slot content must be a <template> element. The content of the template should only be one <oj-c-area-chart-item> element. See the oj-c-area-chart-item doc for more details. A series-id and group-id must be specified.

When the template is executed for each item, it will have access to the chart's binding context containing the following properties:

  • $current - an object that contains information for the current item. (See the table below for a list of properties available on $current)
  • alias - if data-oj-as attribute was specified, the value will be used to provide an application-named alias for $current.

properties.name: data
properties.description: The data object of the current item.

properties.name: key
properties.description: The key of the current item.

properties.name: index
properties.description: The zero-based index of the current item.

name: seriesTemplate
description:
The seriesTemplate slot is used to specify the template for generating the series properties of the chart. The slot content must be a single <template> element. The content of the template should only be one <oj-c-area-chart-series> element.See the oj-c-area-chart-series doc for more details.

When the template is executed for each series, it will have access to the chart's binding context containing the following properties:

  • $current - an object that contains information for the current item. (See the table below for a list of properties available on $current)
  • alias - if data-oj-as attribute was specified, the value will be used to provide an application-named alias for $current.

properties.name: items
properties.description: The array of objects which are chart items that belong to this series. The objects will have the following properties

properties.name: id
properties.description: The series id

properties.name: index
properties.description: The series index

name: groupTemplate
description:
The groupTemplate slot is used to specify the template for generating the group properties of the chart. The slot content must be a single <template> element. The content of the template should only be one <oj-c-area-chart-group> element. See the oj-c-area-chart-group doc for more details.

When the template is executed for each group, it will have access to the chart's binding context containing the following properties:

  • $current - an object that contains information for the current item. (See the table below for a list of properties available on $current)
  • alias - if data-oj-as attribute was specified, the value will be used to provide an application-named alias for $current.

properties.name: items
properties.description: The array of objects which are chart items that belong to this series. The objects will have the following properties

properties.name: ids
properties.description: The key of the current item.

properties.name: index
properties.description: The group index

properties.name: depth
properties.description: The depth of the group. The depth of the outermost group under the invisible root is 1.

name: touchDoc
description:
Target Gesture Action
Data Item Tap Select when selectionMode is enabled.
Drill when drilling is enabled and selectionMode is none.
Double Tap Drill when drilling is enabled and selectionMode is enabled.
Press & Hold Display tooltip.
Display context menu on release.
Categorical Axis Item Tap Drill when drilling is enabled.
Press & Hold Display context menu on release.
Legend Item Tap Drill when drilling is enabled.
Filter when hideAndShowBehavior is enabled.
Plot Area Drag Pan when panning is enabled and toggled into that mode.
Marquee select when selectionMode is multiple and toggled into that mode.
Pinch-close Zoom out when zooming is enabled.
Spread-open Zoom in when zooming is enabled.
Press & Hold Display context menu on release.
Series Area Press & Hold Display context menu on release.
Axis Title Press & Hold Display context menu on release.

name: keyboardDoc
description:
Key Action
Tab Move focus to next element.
Shift + Tab Move focus to previous element.
UpArrow Move focus and selection to previous data item.
DownArrow Move focus and selection to next data item.
LeftArrow Move focus and selection to previous data item.
RightArrow Move focus and selection to next data item.
Shift + UpArrow Move focus and multi-select previous data item.
Shift + DownArrow Move focus and multi-select next data item.
Shift + LeftArrow Move focus and multi-select previous data item.
Shift + RightArrow Move focus and multi-select next data item.
Ctrl + UpArrow Move focus to previous data item, without changing the current selection.
Ctrl + DownArrow Move focus to next data item, without changing the current selection.
Ctrl + LeftArrow Move focus to previous data item, without changing the current selection.
Ctrl + RightArrow Move focus to next data item, without changing the current selection.
Ctrl + Spacebar Multi-select data item with focus.
= or + Zoom in one level if zooming is enabled.
- or _ Zoom out one level if zooming is enabled.
PageUp or Shift + PageUp Pan left in left-to-right locales. Pan right in right-to-left locales.
PageDown or Shift + PageDown Pan right in left-to-right locales. Pan left in right-to-left locales.
Enter Drill on data item, categorical axis label, or legend item when drilling is enabled.
Shift+F10 Launch the context menu if there is one associated with the current item.

properties.name: id
properties.description: The item id should be set by the application if the DataProvider is not being used. The row key will be used as id in the DataProvider case.

properties.name: seriesId
properties.description: The id for the series the item belongs to.

properties.name: groupId
properties.description: The array of ids for the groups the item belongs to. For hierarchical groups, it will be an array of outermost to innermost group ids. This is also used to specify the date for non mixed frequency time axes. The specified date for non mixed frequency time axes must be an ISO string.

properties.name: value
properties.description: The value for this data item. Null can be specified to skip a data point.

properties.name: x
properties.description: The x value. Mainly used to specify the date for mixed-frequency time axis. The date specified in the x value must be an ISO date string.

properties.name: color
properties.description: The color of the data item. This color value is not inherited by chart legend. See chart series color and display-in-legend for more details.

properties.name: markerDisplayed
properties.description: Defines whether the data marker is displayed. Only applies to line, area, scatter, and bubble series. If auto, the markers will be displayed whenever the data points are not connected by a line.

properties.name: markerShape
properties.description: The shape of the data markers. Only applies to line, area, scatter, and bubble series. In addition to the built-in shapes, it may also take SVG path commands to specify a custom shape. The chart will style the custom shapes the same way as built-in shapes, supporting properties like color and borderColor and applying hover and selection effects. Only 'auto' is supported for range series.

properties.name: markerSize
properties.description: The size of the data markers. Only applies to line, area, and scatter series. Does not apply to bubble charts, which calculate marker size based on the z values.

properties.name: categories
properties.description: An optional array of category strings corresponding to this data item. This enables highlighting and filtering of individual data items through interactions with the legend or other visualization elements. If not defined, series categories are used.

properties.name: drilling
properties.description: Whether drilling is enabled for the data item. Drillable objects will show a pointer cursor on hover and fire an ojDrill event on click (double click if selection is enabled). To enable drilling for all data items at once, use the drilling attribute in the top level.

properties.name: shortDesc
properties.description: The description of this object. This is used for accessibility and also for customizing the tooltip text.

properties.name: data
properties.description: The data object of the current item.

properties.name: key
properties.description: The key of the current item.

properties.name: index
properties.description: The zero-based index of the current item.

properties.name: items
properties.description: The array of objects which are chart items that belong to this series. The objects will have the following properties

properties.name: id
properties.description: The series id

properties.name: index
properties.description: The series index

properties.name: items
properties.description: The array of objects which are chart items that belong to this series. The objects will have the following properties

properties.name: ids
properties.description: The key of the current item.

properties.name: index
properties.description: The group index

properties.name: depth
properties.description: The depth of the group. The depth of the outermost group under the invisible root is 1.

properties.name: lineColor
properties.description: The color of the line.

properties.name: lineStyle
properties.description: The style of the line.

properties.name: lineWidth
properties.description: The width of the line.

properties.name: rendered
properties.description: Whether the tick is rendered or not.

ojvalues.name: on
ojvalues.description: Does not render the minor tick.

ojvalues.name: auto
ojvalues.description: Renders the minor tick for log scale.

properties.name: lineColor
properties.description: The color of the line.

properties.name: lineStyle
properties.description: The style of the line.

properties.name: lineWidth
properties.description: The width of the line.

properties.name: rendered
properties.description: Whether the tick is rendered.

ojvalues.name: on
ojvalues.description: Does not render the minor tick.

ojvalues.name: auto
ojvalues.description: Renders the minor tick for log scale.

properties.name: converter
properties.description: The converter used to format the tick label of the axis.

properties.name: rendered
properties.description: Whether the tick labels are rendered or not.

ojvalues.name: off
ojvalues.description: Axis tick labels won't be rendered.

properties.name: style
properties.description: The object defining the style of the labels. The following style properties are supported: color, cursor, fontFamily, fontSize, fontStyle, fontWeight, textDecoration.

properties.name: dataMax
properties.description: The maximum data value corresponding to an axis. If specified, the automatic axis extent calculation will use this value.

properties.name: dataMin
properties.description: The minimum data value corresponding to an axis. If specified, the automatic axis extent calculation will use this value.

properties.name: max
properties.description: The maximum value of the axis. Defaults to null for automatic calculation based on the data.

properties.name: min
properties.description: The minumum value of the axis. Defaults to null for automatic calculation based on the data.

properties.name: majorTick
properties.description: The object defining the properties of the major tick of the y axis.

properties.name: minorTick
properties.description: The object defining the properties of the minor tick of the y axis.

properties.name: tickLabel
properties.description: The object defining the properties of tick labels of the y axis.

properties.name: viewportMin
properties.description:
Specifies the minimum y coordinate of the current viewport for zoom and scroll.
If not specified, this value will be the axis min.

properties.name: viewportMax
properties.description:
Specifies the maximum y coordinate of the current viewport for zoom and scroll.
If not specified, this value will be the axis max.

properties.name: step
properties.description:
The increment between major tick marks in y axis. Defaults to null for automatic calculation based on the data.
For log axis, the step is a multiplier, for example, if the step is 2, the major tick marks will be rendered at 1, 2, 4, 8, and so on.

properties.name: size
properties.description: Defines the size of the axis in terms of ratio of the width (for vertical charts) or height (for horizontal charts).

properties.name: scale
properties.description: Defines the axis scale. If set to log, major ticks will rendered will be incremented in logarithmic ratio.

properties.name: title
properties.description: The title of the axis.

properties.name: titleStyle
properties.description:
The object defining the css properties of the axis title.
The following style properties are supported: color, cursor, fontFamily, fontSize, fontStyle, fontWeight, textDecoration.

properties.name: dataMax
properties.description: The maximum data value corresponding to an axis. If specified, the automatic axis extent calculation will use this value.

properties.name: dataMin
properties.description: The minimum data value corresponding to an axis. If specified, the automatic axis extent calculation will use this value.

properties.name: max
properties.description: The maximum value of the axis. Defaults to null for automatic calculation based on the data.

properties.name: min
properties.description: The minumum value of the axis. Defaults to null for automatic calculation based on the data.

properties.name: majorTick
properties.description: The object defining the properties of the major tick of the y axis.

properties.name: minorTick
properties.description: The object defining the properties of the minor tick of the y axis.

properties.name: tickLabel
properties.description: The object defining the properties of tick labels of the y axis.

properties.name: viewportMin
properties.description:
Specifies the minimum y coordinate of the current viewport for zoom and scroll.
If not specified, this value will be the axis min.

properties.name: viewportMax
properties.description:
Specifies the maximum y coordinate of the current viewport for zoom and scroll.
If not specified, this value will be the axis max.

properties.name: step
properties.description:
The increment between major tick marks in y axis. Defaults to null for automatic calculation based on the data.
For log axis, the step is a multiplier, for example, if the step is 2, the major tick marks will be rendered at 1, 2, 4, 8, and so on.

properties.name: size
properties.description: Defines the size of the axis in terms of ratio of the width (for vertical charts) or height (for horizontal charts).

properties.name: scale
properties.description: Defines the axis scale. If set to log, major ticks will rendered will be incremented in logarithmic ratio.

properties.name: title
properties.description: The title of the axis.

properties.name: titleStyle
properties.description:
The object defining the css properties of the axis title.
The following style properties are supported: color, cursor, fontFamily, fontSize, fontStyle, fontWeight, textDecoration.

properties.name: converter
properties.description: The converter used to format the tick label of the axis. When using a time axis, this attribute also takes an array of two converters, which apply respectively to the first and second label levels.

properties.name: rendered
properties.description: Whether the tick labels are rendered or not.

ojvalues.name: off
ojvalues.description: Axis tick labels won't be rendered.

properties.name: rotation
properties.description:
Defines whether the chart will automatically rotate the labels by 90 degrees in order to fit more labels on the axis.
The rotation will only be applied to categorical labels for a horizontal axis.

ojvalues.name: none
ojvalues.description: The axis labels will not be rotated.

ojvalues.name: off
ojvalues.description: The axis labels might be rotated in order to fit more labels.

properties.name: style
properties.description:
The object defining the style of the labels. The following style properties are supported: color, cursor, fontFamily, fontSize, fontStyle, fontWeight, textDecoration, whiteSpace.
The CSS white-space property can be defined with value "nowrap" to disable default text wrapping of categorical labels

properties.name: majorTick
properties.description: The object defining the properties of the major tick of the x axis.

properties.name: minorTick
properties.description: The object defining the properties of the minor tick of the x axis.

properties.name: tickLabel
properties.description: The object defining the properties of tick labels of the x axis.

properties.name: viewportMin
properties.description:
Specifies the minimum y coordinate of the current viewport for zoom and scroll.
If not specified, this value will be the axis min.

properties.name: viewportMax
properties.description:
Specifies the maximum y coordinate of the current viewport for zoom and scroll.
If not specified, this value will be the axis max.

properties.name: step
properties.description:
The increment between major tick marks in y axis. Defaults to null for automatic calculation based on the data.
For log axis, the step is a multiplier, for example, if the step is 2, the major tick marks will be rendered at 1, 2, 4, 8, and so on.

properties.name: size
properties.description: Defines the size of the axis in terms of ratio of the width (for vertical charts) or height (for horizontal charts).

properties.name: scale
properties.description: Defines the axis scale. If set to log, major ticks will rendered will be incremented in logarithmic ratio.

properties.name: title
properties.description: The title of the axis.

properties.name: titleStyle
properties.description: The object defining the css properties of the axis title.

properties.name: backgroundColor
properties.description: The color of the plot area background.

properties.name: tooltipLabel
properties.description:
A string representing the label that is displayed before the value in the tooltip.
This value can also take an array of strings to be applied to hierarchical group names, from outermost to innermost.

properties.name: tooltipDisplay
properties.description: Whether the value is displayed in the tooltip.

ojvalues.name: off
ojvalues.description: The property will not be displayed in tooltip.

ojvalues.name: on
ojvalues.description: The property will be displayed in tooltip.

properties.name: converter
properties.description: The converter to format the numerical value for the tooltip.

properties.name: tooltipLabel
properties.description:
A string representing the label that is displayed before the value in the tooltip.
This value can also take an array of strings to be applied to hierarchical group names, from outermost to innermost.

properties.name: tooltipDisplay
properties.description: Whether the value is displayed in the tooltip.

ojvalues.name: off
ojvalues.description: The property will not be displayed in tooltip.

ojvalues.name: on
ojvalues.description: The property will be displayed in tooltip.

properties.name: group
properties.description: Object that specifies the value formatting and tooltip behavior for the group.

properties.name: series
properties.description: Object that specifies the value formatting and tooltip behavior for the series.

properties.name: value
properties.description: Object that specifies the value formatting and tooltip behavior for the item value.

properties.name: groupSeparators
properties.description: An object defining the group separator lines in hierarchical axis.

properties.name: assignedToY2
properties.description: Defines whether the series is associated with the y2 axis.

properties.name: categories
properties.description: An array of category strings corresponding to the tag cloud items. This allows highlighting and filtering of items.

properties.name: color
properties.description: The color of the series. The chart legend item will inherit this color value.

properties.name: drilling
properties.description: Whether drilling is enabled on the series item. Drillable objects will show a pointer cursor on hover and fire an ojDrill event on click (double click if selection is enabled). To enable drilling for all series items at once, use the drilling attribute in the top level.

properties.name: lineType
properties.description: The line type of the data line or area. Only applies to line, area, scatter, and bubble series. centeredStepped and centeredSegmented are not supported for polar, scatter, and bubble charts.

properties.name: markerShape
properties.description: The shape of the data markers. In addition to the built-in shapes, it may also take SVG path commands to specify a custom shape. The chart will style the custom shapes the same way as built-in shapes, supporting properties like color and borderColor and applying hover and selection effects. Only 'auto' is supported for range series.

properties.name: markerColor
properties.description: The color of the data markers, if different from the series color.

properties.name: markerDisplayed
properties.description: Defines whether the data marker is displayed. Only applies to line, area, scatter, and bubble series. If auto, the markers will be displayed whenever the data points are not connected by a line.

properties.name: markerSize
properties.description: The size of the data markers.

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of the series, displayed in the legend and tooltips.

properties.name: shortDesc
properties.description: The description of this series. This is used for accessibility and for customizing the tooltip text on the corresponding legend item for the series.

properties.name: drilling
properties.description: Whether drilling is enabled in the group label.

properties.name: id
properties.description: The id of the group.

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of the group.

properties.name: accessibleLabel
properties.description: The description of the group. This is used for the customizing the tooltip text and only applies to a categorical axis.

properties.name: groups
properties.description: An array of sub groups belonging to this group.

name: ChartLegend
description: The chart legend type.

properties.name: position
properties.description:
The position of the legend within the chart. By default, the legend will be placed on the side or bottom
of the chart.

properties.name: rendered
properties.description: Defines whether the legend is rendered. If set to auto, the legend will be hidden for charts with a large bunber of series.

properties.name: maxSize
properties.description: The max size of the legend in pixels or in percentage.

properties.name: size
properties.description: Defines the size of legend in pixel or percent.

properties.name: symbolHeight
properties.description: The height of the legend symbol (line or marker) in pixels.

properties.name: symbolWidth
properties.description: The width of the legend symbol (line or marker) in pixels.

name: MenuItem
description: Specifies a standard menu item.

properties.name: type
properties.description: Specifies a standard menu item.

properties.name: label
properties.description: The menu item label.

properties.name: key
properties.description: A unique key associated with the menu item.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Specifies if the menu item is disabled (enabled by default).

properties.name: onAction
properties.description: Optional callback function associated with the menu item.

properties.name: startIcon
properties.description: Optional icon to render at the start of the menu item.

tstype.value: { type?: 'class'; class: string; }|{ type: 'img'; src: string; }

properties.name: endIcon
properties.description: Optional icon to render at the end of the menu item.

tstype.value: { type?: 'class'; class: string; }|{ type: 'img'; src: string; }

properties.name: variant
properties.description: Specifies the menu item behavior.

name: MenuSelectItem
description: Specifies a selectable item in a menu item.

properties.name: label
properties.description: The selectable item label.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Specifies if the selectable item is disabled (enabled by default).

properties.name: endIcon
properties.description: Optional icon to render at the end of the selectable item.

tstype.value: { type?: 'class'; class: string; }|{ type: 'img'; src: string; }

properties.name: value
properties.description: The value associated with the selectable item.

properties.name: at
properties.description:
Takes an integer value and returns the item at that index,
allowing for positive and negative integers.
Negative integers count back from the last item in the array.

properties.name: type
properties.description: Specifies a select single menu item.

properties.name: key
properties.description: A unique key associated with the select single.

properties.name: items
properties.description: Specifies the array of select items that make up the select single.

properties.name: type
properties.description: Specifies a select multiple menu item.

properties.name: key
properties.description: A unique key associated with the select multiple.

properties.name: items
properties.description: Specifies the array of select items that make up the select multiple.

properties.name: type
properties.description: Specifies a submenu menu item.

properties.name: key
properties.description: A unique key associated with the submenu menu item.

properties.name: label
properties.description: The submenu label.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Specifies if the submenu is disabled (enabled by default).

properties.name: startIcon
properties.description: Optional icon to render at the start of the submenu.
